item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 域泛化] Probability Weighted Compact Feature for DA Retrieval (CVPR 2020)
item.description: Probability Weighted Compact Feature for Domain Adaptive Retrieval (CVPR 2020) 开源代码传送门 概述 本文提出一种 Probability Weighted Compact Feature Learning (PWCF) 架构。 模型架构 Focal-triplet Loss
